V.iv.1.B.6.d
.
38 CFR 3.105(a) CUE Grant Template
Use the
38 CFR 3.105(a)
grant template, accessible from VBMS-R's PROFILE tab, when granting benefits on the basis of clear and unmistakable error (CUE).
Note
:  The
38 CFR 3.105(a)
template is comprised of both automated text and free text. It appears at the top of the first page of the
Codesheet
below the data tables.
References
:  For more information on
the CUE template in VBMS-R, see the
VBMS-R User Guide
, and
CUEs, see
M21-1, Part X, Subpart ii, 5
.
title: M21-1, Part V, Subpart iv, Chapter 1, Section B - Codesheet Section
citation: Part V, Subpart iv, Chapter 1, Section B
